create.sql: CREATE TABLE `ut_schedule` ( `TurID` int(4) NOT NULL auto_increment, `TournamentID` int(8) default NULL, `Tour` tinyint(4) default NULL, `Date` int(11) default NULL, `Comments` text, `Event` tinyint(4) default NULL, `Finished` tinyint(4) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`TurID`), KEY `Tur` (`Tour`), KEY `Date` (`Date`), KEY `Type` (`TournamentID`) );

field.name: Tournament
field.sql: select concat(t.TournamentID,'|',c.Number), concat_ws(', ',if(s.StartYear=s.EndYear,s.StartYear,concat(s.StartYear,'/',s.EndYear)), t.Name_$lang;, if(r.Name_$lang;='',null,r.Name_$lang;), case r.reglament WHEN 0 THEN if(r.Games=2,null,concat(c.Number-r.tour1+1,' Тур')) WHEN 1 THEN concat('1/',power(2, floor((r.tour2-c.Number)/r.Games)+1),' финала') WHEN 2 THEN if(r.Tour2-r.Tour1 <= r.Games ,null,concat(round((c.Number-r.tour1+1)/r.Games),' Тур')) Else c.Number end , if(r.Games=2, if(mod (r.tour2-c.Number,2),'первый матч','ответный матч'),null) ) from en_numbers c,ut_tournaments t,ut_reglaments r, ut_seasons s where r.tour1<=c.Number and r.tour2>=c.Number and s.SeasonID=t.SeasonID and (r.TournamentID=t.TournamentID ) and (s.StartYear=from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(),'%Y') or s.EndYear=from_unixtime(unix_timestamp(),'%Y')) order by t.Name_$lang;,c.Number

select.sql: select c.*,t.Name_$lang; as Tournament, if(StartYear=EndYear,StartYear,concat(StartYear,'/',EndYear)) as Season from ut_schedule c left outer join ut_tournaments t on c.TournamentID=t.TournamentID left outer join ut_seasons s on t.SeasonID=s.SeasonID order by abs(Date-unix_timestamp()) asc, s.StartYear desc
